text-me: Focused on excellence, committed to collaborating effectively in development teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
text-about-me: A technology enthusiast passionate about development. Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science at UEPB, with hands-on project experience. My goal is to create impactful and functional digital experiences that captivate users. I am excited to share my work and contribute to innovative projects.
text-about-me-short: A technology enthusiast passionate about development, currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science at UEPB. I am excited to share my work and contribute to innovative projects.
text-skills: Check out some programming languages, technologies, and methodologies I have experience with and that I constantly strive to improve my knowledge in.
text-projects: Explore my recent projects and discover my work. From dynamic web applications to creative experiments, each project reflects my commitment to quality and innovation. Feel free to explore, learn, and get inspired.
text-projects-short: Explore my recent projects and discover my work. From dynamic applications to creative experiments. Feel free to explore, learn, and get inspired.
text-contact: If you want to get in touch with me to discuss projects, professional opportunities, or even just to exchange ideas, please feel free to send me a message. I look forward to meeting you and exploring possible synergies.
text-experiences: Throughout my journey, I have had the opportunity to participate in academic and professional projects that allowed me to gain hands-on experience in software development. I have worked with modern technologies, collaborated in agile teams, and delivered solutions that solve real-world problems. My experience includes developing web applications, implementing innovative features, and constantly striving for improvement.
text-experiences-short: I have experience in software development, participating in academic and professional projects, delivering practical solutions with a focus on quality and innovation.
